modName: The eight divines Followers in Aetherius
summary: this mod add the divines as a followers but dont worry it don\'t interface anything
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone im skull19972 and this is my mod number 6

This add a new Island by the name Aetherius in sovngard
You can see pic 
i dident create the name Aetherius of my island 
you can see \"the elder of scroll skyrim Aetherius wikipedia\" 
Aetherius is a place in sovngard where the eight divines of the nirn live so i did create a little place of Aetherius to the game since its not create

check skyrim Aetherius wiki!!!

the Island obtain all the eight divines statue with some chests a table a firewood a bed just to look awesome like a home
in this new Island you will see the eight divines that i mad they look like their statues they are extremely very powerful and strong and they live in that island + a note in the island see pic
they are followers and don\'t worry i did just create them so it dont interface or retex any thing in the game
Akatosh is a dragon and all the others is humans (divines humans)
They are followers and they live with you in that island but the bad thing is that you can only enter during the quest to enter sovngard!!!! :///



but dont worry here is my mod number 7 The training House 
it create a new door to teleport from tamriel to sovngard by a house of training who obtain all manquins chests training things!!!! its a awesome house of training that teleport you to sovngard
so with my mod number7 you can enter sovngard what ever you want!!!!
And like this you can obtain the eight divines followers what ever you want!!!!

Good bye im Skull19972 and this is my mod number 6 Enjoy!!!
author: skull19972
